messages.title: The strong voice Cambridge needs...
messages.content: Bookies and pundits have confirmed that the election here in Cambridge will be very close between popular Lib Dem Julian Huppert and Jeremy Corbyn's Labour candidate.

messages.title: Your vote could make all the difference
messages.content: Tight two-horse race expected. Just 599 votes separated Julian Huppert and Labour back in 2015. The Conservatives finished a poor and distant third and cannot compete here. Your next MP will either be Julian Huppert, with his solid record of standing up for Cambridge, or Jeremy Corbyn's Labour candidate.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposing an extreme UKIP-style Brexit to protect jobs and ensure our local businesses and universities get the support they need.
Giving our underfunded NHS and social care an extra £6 billion each year to help boost services, including mental healthcare.
An extra £7 billion for schools to help ensure our children receive the first-class education they deserve.
